    ReinforcementLearning.findNextTile​(ReinforcementTile state, Action previousAction)
    If the agent can go forwards or backwards this calculates the action requried to go forwards Gets the bearing of the direction to go backwards, and gets the first action that doesn't equal this bearing Allows it to go any direction except backwards

    ReinforcementTile.getMaxAction()
    Gets the action with the largest q-value in the state Iterates through the list and compares the q-values with the current largest value

    ReinforcementLearning.getRandomAction​(ReinforcementTile state)
    Returns a random action from the current state Gets a random number between 0 and the size of the states' actions list size Indexes from actions list with random int

    void
    ReinforcementLearning.doAction​(Action action)
    Makes the agent move based on the action given as a parameter Depending on the action being done, decided by switch statement that is decided by the parameter action Iterates through maze to find the tile that the agent will move to Sets new tile to be occupied, and increments visits Sets the old tile to be not occupied Sets old tile to be previous state
